Introduction

title: Projects
text:
Home About Projects CV Contact




  
  
    üèóÔ∏è Crawford Development Risk Assessment
    
      Conducted risk and profitability analysis for residential and commercial projects using simulation models.
      Simulated project NPVs under uncertain market conditions to assess loan repayment likelihood and project stability.
      Recommended the commercial project for its steady, low-risk returns.
    
  

  
  
    üèôÔ∏è Borough Park Real Estate Analysis
    
      Used Power BI, R, and Solver to analyze 10 years of property data.
      Built predictive models (regression, time series) to forecast sales and prices, and used optimization to balance costs and improve profitability.
    
  

  
  
    üç∫ Microbrewery Integration for Austin-Detroit Pizza
    
      Evaluated the feasibility of adding a craft microbrewery to an existing pizza restaurant through marketing and finance simulations.
      Forecasted revenue, optimized costs, and achieved a breakeven within 3.3 months by aligning production with seasonal demand.
      Proposed staffing and growth roadmap for sustainable expansion.
